item.title: ::yell mod+?
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

… just go into ur client.java and CTRL+F and search for (“yell”) and after that when it says something like

} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) { 
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }</blockquote>  ... idk if it'll look like that? it should look close :P ... but change it to <blockquote>} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) && playerRights == 1) {</blockquote>

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        } [/quote]

HOPE THAT HELPS!!! just copy and paste the second one into ur yell command area and it SHOULD work!

Read full topic
